m_szDocSumamry: Login Why General Motors is Waiting to Launch a Hydrogen Fuel Cell Car GM has great fuel-cell technology. But there are two big reasons why it hasn't yet brought a fuel-cell vehicle to market, and why it probably won't for another few years. John Rosevear ( TMFMarlowe ) Feb 18, 2016 at 6:20PM GM's fleet of Chevy Equinox SUVs powered by fuel cells has been running since 2007, and has covered more than 3 million miles.
